attributes.action: 10% of all firework sales to go to animal welfare
attributes.additional_details:
Many animals react adversely to fireworks which go off all day and night. Animals are truly petrified and need constant supervision, attention or medication.

Not all pet owners are able to take the best course of action for their animals due to lack of funds or knowledge or accessibility.

10% of the sale of all fireworks should finance development of a range of services that provide support for animals and their owners, such as:

- Information & advice
- Support
- Subsidised or free medication for animals
- Resources
